TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontSizeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將字型大小值與其他型別表示來回轉換。

span.span: Converts font size values to and from other type representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件支援下列型別來回轉換： 包含， ， ，和。The object supports conversion to and from the following types: include , , , and . 沒有不實際`FontSize`類型，而字型大小值通常會輸入成，因此轉換子的目的型別是。There is no actual `FontSize` type, but values for font sizes are generally typed as , so the converter's destination type is .
